level.heading: Destroying cemetery railing or tomb.
level.text: If any person shall maliciously cut down, demolish, or otherwise injure any railing, fence, or inclosure around or upon any cemetery, or shall injure or deface any tomb or inscription thereon, such person shall be fined not more than $100.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-119, see Historical and Statutory Notes following § 22-3309.
